metadata.title: CVE-2019-7349 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3,allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code via a vulnerable'newMonitor[V4LCapturesPerFrame]' parameter value in the view monitor(monitor.php) because proper filtration is omitted.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
